title: TFW someone steals your penta
body:
1. It's very annoying{{champion:38}} 
2. Usually stolen by{{champion:114}}

replies.body:
Was about to get a Kat penta at our nexus in one last ditch defence before we were going to inevitable lose anyway and just as I was chasing down last kill, the Leona chasing with me had her W pop and stole it with her like 100 DMG AOE automatically so I promptly threw my computer out the window.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
About to get a Lee Sin Penta, get Quadra, My missus steals the 5th kill will Maokai -_-
